post.title: Day 03 - Sunday, January 03, 2021
post.content:
It's third day of the year and I didn't do much because I am learning about Android App Development.

What I Learned Today

ğŸ’» Programming

  • Read Android Studio Overview and Workflow basics from Android Developers Official Documentation.
  • Console Methods to debug Javascript like a pro. Jeff Delaney's 100 second video expalins a lot about console which I think most JS-Devs don't even know about. Personally my favourite one was that you can style your console messages with CSS. This Article and this StackOverflow answer explains about styling your console messages.
